DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.orders.order_id, account.users.name AS entered_by, sales.orders.value_date, sales.orders.expected_delivery_date, core.offices.office_name, sales.orders.terms, sales.orders.cancelled, sales.orders.internal_memo, inventory.customers.customer_name, sales.orders.taxable_total, sales.orders.discount, sales.orders.tax_rate, sales.orders.tax, COALESCE(sales.orders.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(sales.orders.tax, 0) - COALESCE(sales.orders.discount, 0) AS sub_total, sales.orders.nontaxable_total, COALESCE(sales.orders.taxable_total, 0) + COALESCE(sales.orders.tax, 0) + COALESCE(sales.orders.nontaxable_total, 0) - COALESCE(sales.orders.discount, 0) AS total FROM sales.orders INNER JOIN core.offices ON sales.orders.office_id = core.offices.office_id INNER JOIN account.users ON sales.orders.user_id = account.users.user_id LEFT JOIN inventory.customers ON sales.orders.customer_id = inventory.customers.customer_id WHERE sales.orders.order_id=@order_id;

SELECT inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, sales.order_details.price, sales.order_details.quantity, inventory.units.unit_name, ROUND(sales.order_details.price * sales.order_details.quantity, 4) AS amount, sales.order_details.discount, sales.order_details.shipping_charge, ROUND((sales.order_details.price * sales.order_details.quantity) - sales.order_details.discount + sales.order_details.shipping_charge, 4) AS total FROM sales.order_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON sales.order_details.item_id = inventory.items.item_id INNER JOIN inventory.units ON sales.order_details.unit_id = inventory.units.unit_id WHERE sales.order_details.order_id = @order_id ORDER BY sales.order_details.order_detail_id;
